Several pedestrians are visible; one man walks from the center middle ground toward the camera before exiting on the right. He is followed by another man in a denim jacket who walks from the center middle ground, moves toward the center foreground, and passes the camera on the right. Other people, including a worker in a yellow vest, are located further back in the center middle ground and background. The scene is framed by tall buildings on both the left and right, which recede into the background.
